caption: A classic boom-bap hip-hop track built on a nostalgic foundation. A steady drum machine groove with a crisp snare drives the song forward beneath atmospheric synth pads that create an introspective mood. The male rapper delivers confident verses with a clear flow, while the chorus shifts to melodic, layered vocal harmonies soaked in reverb for an anthemic feel. The arrangement is punctuated by spoken ad-libs treated with echo effects and concludes with an extended outro featuring heavily filtered vocals over a stripped-back beat before fading into ambient textures.
lyrics:
[Intro]
Yo
It's La√∞um
You already know
Money talks
They don't talk back

[Verse 1]
I stay with the heat, streets raised me
Never folded under pressure, now I'm way crazy
Chains on my neck, still my grind daily
But my soul stay heavy, yeah the grind ain't lazy
Old heads stackin', but I flip through the beat
Stackin' chips on chips, now they movin' in the street
But the streets ain't ready, now my path got heat
Used to dream to win, now I move with the beat
Copped a cold brick, got heat in my heart
Now my chain swing tight, I been playin' my part
Money ain't a thing, but it takes its part
Still I carry my soul like it's built from the start

[Chorus]
So tell me, why they hate when you live?
Got the heart of a king, but the soul in the bills
Tell me, who the heck do they feel?
When the world keep spinnin' but you lost it all still
(Still, still, still)
Why they hate when you live?
With the heart of a king, but the soul in the bills
Tell me, who the heck do they feel?
When the world keep spinnin' but you lost it all still
(Still, still, still)
Why they hate when you live?
With the heart of a king, but the soul in the bills
Tell me, who the heck do they feel?
When the world keep spinnin' but you lost it all still
(Still, still, still)

[Verse 2]
They talk about the grind but I'm broke, I'm grindin'
Every dollar spent, now the people still whinin'
But I keep my head high, never fold, never lyin'
And my heart's still cold even when the day's lyin'
One road left but I can't ride that chain
I'ma keep it movin', yeah they all feel my pain
They say money talks, but I'm answerin' it's still
So I made it in silence, now I'm free from the deal

[Chorus]
Tell me, why they hate when you live?
Got the heart of a king, but the soul in the bills
Tell me, who the heck do they feel?
When the world keep spinnin' but you lost it all still
(Still, still, still)
Why they hate when you live?
With the heart of a king, but the soul in the bills
Tell me, who the heck do they feel?
When the world keep spinnin' but you lost it all still
(Still, still, still)
Why they hate when you live?
With the heart of a king, but the soul in the bills
Tell me, who the heck do they feel?
When the world keep spinnin' but you lost it all still
(Still, still, still)

[Outro]
They can't cage the vibe, yeah
You gotta stay in
It's money and power, a universe, one rule
Money is the money
And I'm not at the bottom
[Instrumental fades out]
